title: Smart Data Models - WindContPType3IEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. P control model Type 3.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindContPType3IEC

WindDynamicsLookupTable.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The P control type 3 model with which this wind dynamics lookup table is associated. Default: 'list'

WindGenTurbineType3IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 3 model with which this Wind control P type 3 model is associated. Default: None

dpmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum wind turbine power ramp rate (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

dtrisemaxlvrt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Limitation of torque rise rate during LVRT for S (d). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kdtd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain for active drive train damping (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kip.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller integration parameter (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kpp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

mplvrt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Enable LVRT power control mode (M true = 1: voltage control false = 0: reactive power control.  It is project dependent parameter. Default: False

omegaoffset.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Offset to reference value that limits controller action during rotor speed changes (omega). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

pdtdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum active drive train damping power (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

rramp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ramp limitation of torque, required in some grid codes (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tdvs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Timedelay after deep voltage sags (T). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0

temin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum electrical generator torque (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tomegafilt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Filter time constant for generator speed measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tpfilt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Filter time constant for power measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tpord.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant in power order lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tufilt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Filter time constant for voltage measurement (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tuscale.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage scaling factor of reset-torque (T). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

twref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant in speed reference filter (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

udvs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage limit for hold LVRT status after deep voltage sags (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

updip.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage dip threshold for P-control ().  Part of turbine control, often different (e.g 0.8) from converter thresholds. It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

wdtd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active drive train damping frequency (omega). It can be calculated from two mass model parameters. It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

zeta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient for active drive train damping (zeta). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0
